context: Hi. I'm looking for some fun movies for a girls night Something like Ocean's 8 (2018) . I'm really looking forward to seeing that
Well my favorite is White Chicks (2004) That's pretty funny
I haven't seen that. The Wayans are a little too dumb for me Pitch Perfect (2012) is one of my favoites
resp: Did you see Now You See Me (2013)?? That's a good one
